title: His Curvy Obsession
description: *All the books in Obsessed Alphas are standalone and can be read in any orderHis Curvy ObsessionObsessed Alphas- Book 2An Older Alpha Man Younger Curvy Woman RomanceI’m done with love.I'm done with people breaking my heart.From this point forward, I’ll surround myself with books and call it good.That’s the plan… until the sexiest man I’ve ever seen walks in the door.Now, I know I’m in trouble and if I’m not careful, there will be no turning back.Am I ready to give love another chance or am I setting myself up for more heartache?"His Curvy Obsession" is the second book in the Obsessed Alphas Series. This book contains over the top declarations, steamy, hot love scenes that set your kindle on fire. Grab this book if you love insta love, short, steamy romance books with a hea.
author: Julie Scarlet
